name: Boomi Flow Email Service
description: A plugin that allows your Boomi Flows to send emails via SMTP

S3_BUCKET.description: The AWS S3 bucket used to store attachments temporarily

S3_ACCESS_KEY.description: A valid AWS S3 access key used to store attachments temporarily

S3_SECRET_KEY.description: A valid AWS S3 secret key used to store attachments temporarily

S3_REGION.description: A valid AWS S3 region used to store attachments temporarily

BOX_APP_USER_ID.description: The ID of the App User in the created Box application, used to fetch attachments from Box

BOX_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID of the created Box application, used to fetch attachments from Box

BOX_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of the created Box application, used to fetch attachments from Box

BOX_PUBLIC_KEY_ID.description: The ID of a public key for the created Box application, used to fetch attachments from Box

BOX_PRIVATE_KEY.description: A private key for the created Box application, used to fetch attachments from Box

BOX_PRIVATE_KEY_PASSWORD.description: The password for the above private key
